meaningMnemonic: You <radical>stop</radical> at a <radical>small</radical> <radical>slide</radical>. What were you doing before you stopped here? You were <kanji>walk</kanji>ing.
readingMnemonic: So, you're <kanji>walk</kanji>ing around, minding your own business, when suddenly something flips up and whacks you in the face. You stepped on the head of a <reading>hoe</reading> (ほ) and it caused it to swing up from the ground and hit you.
